content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining coal
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) collecting coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5) moving coal from drill to chest

### Iron Production Line 1 at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace 
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0) smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) storing iron/copper plates

### Iron Production Line 2 at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0) smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) storing iron plates

### Power Generation at position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5) pumping water
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) generating steam
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5) generating power
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam
- Electricity network powering machines

### Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) for raw materials
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) feeding assembler
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5) making science packs
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving packs to output
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) collecting science packs
- Lab consuming science packs for research
- Belt network connecting components

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Check if items actually exist in the target chest before attempting extraction
- Verify production line is working and outputting items before collection

### Errors when inserting items without having them
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting insertion
- Ensure production chains are working to maintain item supply

### Production stalling issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Keep coal supply running to power burner inserters and mining drills
- Ensure all required ingredients are available for assembling machines
